md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,1,1217507712,McDonald's,McDonald's Global Markets LLC,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/mcdonalds/id1217507712?uo=4,0.0,2.72277,101,Food & Drink,"Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,2,1481818660,CibouScan - You Scan,henri gil,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/cibouscan-you-scan/id1481818660?uo=4,0.0,4.57951,283,Food & Drink,"CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes
CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.
Beauty: your bathroom under control

column3: Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

column1: Food: scan, decode, cook

column3: Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

column1: Practical, complete and privacy-friendly

column3: No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

column1: Why choose CIBOUSCAN?

column3: One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

column1: Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.
** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps
Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.
- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -
Premium gives access to all the features of the application!
The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.
CGU / CGV: https://weblogit.co.uk/cgu.html
Privacy: https://weblogit.co.uk/privacy.html
We keep in touch ?
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/ciboulette.app/
- Site : https://ciboulette.app/
- Mail : henri@ciboulette.app - lisa@ciboulette.app",2019-10-02T07:00:00Z,2025-11-17T11:29:05Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,4,6747891700,Love Sushi PMR - доставка еды,"Gud Fud, OOO",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/love-sushi-pmr-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D1%8B/id6747891700?uo=4,0.0,4.96774,1178,Food & Drink,"Онлайн-ресторан в Тирасполе и Бендерах: вкусные блюда на дом!

Мы предлагаем разнообразное меню для гурманов. Наши повара готовят с душой, а вы можете насладиться едой, не выходя из дома. Закажите через приложение, сайт или по телефону, и курьер доставит заказ в течение часа.
Как это работает?
* Оформить заказ можно в любое время.
* Мы обрабатываем заказы с 10:30 до 01:00.
* Доставка осуществляется с 11:00 до 01:00.
* Бесплатно при заказе от 150 рублей в Тирасполе и от 200 рублей в Бендерах.
* Доставка в другие населенные пункты.
Почему стоит выбрать наш онлайн-ресторан «Love Sushi PMR»?
1. Мы строго следуем рецептам.
2. Используем свежие и качественные ингредиенты.
3. Доставка в удобной упаковке.
4. Внимательное отношение к каждому клиенту.
5. Гибкий график доставки.
6. Регулярно проводим розыгрыши, акции и скидки, чтобы сделать ваш заказ еще приятнее.",2025-07-14T07:00:00Z,2025-10-02T07:10:22Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,5,1504231614,Zakaz.md,Zakaz Investments Limited,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/zakaz-md/id1504231614?uo=4,0.0,4.93384,2373,Food & Drink,"Cumpărături prin Zakaz md: ușor, rapid, accesibil
Comenzile online devin un serviciu din ce în ce mai răspândit în prezent.
Vizitați Metro md și veți descoperi personal cât de ușor puteți plasa o comandă. Avantajele utilizării versiunii mobile:
· Comod în utilizare – interfață simplă și clară.
· Procesare rapidă a comenzilor.
· Accesibilitate oriunde și oricând, întrucât telefonul se află întotdeauna la îndemână.
· Listă amplă a celor mai renumite supermarketuri.

Livrare rapidă și convenabilă

Accesând, de exemplu, platforma comercială Metro puteți comanda rapid online tot ce aveți nevoie direct de la domiciliu. Coletul vă va fi livrat în cel mai scurt timp posibil la adresa indicată. Biroul logistică coordonează traseul, astfel încât procesul de livrare să fie cât mai rapid. Ca opțiune alternativă, puteți utiliza serviciile Nova Poshta. Pentru informații detaliate, accesați aplicația serviciului de livrare Zakaz.
Efectuați achiziții convenabile cu maxim confort!",2020-07-08T07:00:00Z,2025-11-12T21:50:37Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,6,1451492388,Bolt Food,BOLT TECHNOLOGY OU,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/bolt-food/id1451492388?uo=4,0.0,4.58333,132,Food & Drink,"Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.
WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.
HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!
DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:

Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.
*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:

Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.
*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.
*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT

As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers.

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.
Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.
Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.
Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.
*Only available in selected markets.",2019-08-19T07:00:00Z,2025-11-18T08:35:04Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,7,1568506349,Food.ru: пошаговые фоторецепты,"Closed Joint Stock Company""Trade House""Perekrestok",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/food-ru-%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B5-%D1%84%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BF%D1%82%D1%8B/id1568506349?uo=4,0.0,4.66667,6,Food & Drink,"Food.ru — это информационная медиаплатформа о жизни со вкусом и смыслом, которую в 2021 году запустила компания X5.

Мы следим за трендами и создаем их вместе с вами. Не только в еде: говорим о ЗОЖ и саморазвитии, хобби и путешествиях, дизайне и ремонте, моде и красоте. Обо всем, что делает жизнь проще, а обычный день — ярче.

А еще у нас есть «Тёрка» — площадка для обмена жизненными историями, фотками питомцев и, конечно же, советами по кулинарии и впечатлениями от еды. Здесь мы собираем истории от людей — и для людей. Присылайте свои истории и перетирайте другие в комментариях!

Food.ru — это пространство для всех, кто умеет готовить или хочет научиться. Достаточно прислать рецепт, чтобы стать частью кулинарного сообщества, или поделиться мнением в комментариях. Что бы вы ни готовили, мы хотим готовить с вами.

Закуски, салаты, гарниры, горячие блюда, жаркое, десерты и выпечка — во всех рецептах вы найдете подробный список ингредиентов и пошаговые фото- и видеоинструкции по приготовлению. Повторить блюдо на домашней кухне сможет абсолютно любая хозяйка.

С Food.ru вы легко научитесь готовить национальную еду. Классика русской кухни представлена рецептами блинов, окрошек, щей, блюдами из рыбы и из яиц. В разделе японской кухни найдете рецепты суши и роллов. Узбекская кухня — это плов, шашлык, манты, шурпа. Выбор богатый: в приложении есть азиатская, средиземноморская, индийская, испанская, итальянская и даже норвежская кухни — все, чтобы разнообразить ваше ежедневное меню или приготовить особое блюдо на праздник.

Если вы придерживаетесь правильного питания, то сможете рассчитать КБЖУ для каждого блюда и приготовить сбалансированный завтрак, обед или ужин. ПП начинается с привычки ежедневно обращать внимание на свой рацион и отказа от вредных продуктов: алкогольных напитков, коктейлей, чипсов, тортов, а иногда даже хлеба.

Ежедневно на Food.ru публикуются материалы о том, как готовить и экономить, о питании для детей, полезных пищевых привычках, заготовках и об искусстве жарить мясо на огне. Все интересное мы разложили в 5 разделов: «Все о еде», «ЗОЖ», «Готовим детям», «Мужская кухня» и «Заготовки». Каждый раздел посвящен своей теме, но вместе они образуют вселенную Food.ru.
ВСЕ О ЕДЕ

Но не только! Делимся советами, в каких ситуациях что приготовить — и подсказками на разные случаи жизни. Например, как реализовать на практике ответственный подход, как провести любое время года с пользой, куда обязательно стоит сходить или съездить и так далее.
ЗОЖ

Это — рубрика не только о здоровом питании и пользе и вреде разных продуктов. Говорим о личном опыте разных людей: бариста, курьеров, фуд-стилистов, винных экспертов и многих других. Еще — о том, как связаны еда и искусство, как жить свою жизнь и о многом другом.
ГОТОВИМ ДЕТЯМ

Рассказываем, как вырастить ребенка со здоровыми пищевыми привычками и вкусно накормить самого привередливого малыша. А еще подсказываем, что делать, если ребенок не хочет в школу, как обустроить детскую и так далее.
МУЖСКАЯ КУХНЯ
Здесь — про культуру мяса и о том, как управляться с едой по-мужски. А еще — о том, какие технические девайсы помогут вести хозяйство проще.
ЗАГОТОВКИ
О том, как консервировать, солить, сушить, замораживать продукты и варить варенья.
Скачивайте, готовьте и читайте: Food.ru — жизнь со вкусом и смыслом!",2021-08-03T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T06:48:43Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,8,881463973,Магнит: акции и доставка,Tander ZAO,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%82-%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8-%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0/id881463973?uo=4,0.0,4.63855,83,Food & Drink,"Магнит: акции и доставка — это приложение, в котором мы собрали всё самое полезное:
БОНУСЫ С КАРТОЙ МАГНИТ ПЛЮС
1 бонус = 1 ₽. Получайте до 2% кешбэка за покупки в магазинах и заказы с доставкой и самовывозом. Оплачивайте бонусами до 50% чека на кассе или в приложении.
БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ДОСТАВКА

Продукты, косметика и товары для дома. Привезём куда удобно — бесплатно. Скидка 25% на первый заказ от 1000 ₽ с доставкой или самовывозом по промокоду MAGNIT. Действует в Экспрессе, Гипере и Косметик.
МАГНИТ МАРКЕТ
Миллионы товаров с доставкой за 1 день. Забирайте из удобного магазина Магнит. Работает в 122 городах.
ПЕРСОНАЛЬНЫЕ СКИДКИ ДО 30%
Акции и предложения на основе истории ваших покупок. А ещё 3 любимые категории в месяц — получайте от 10% кешбэка бонусами за эти товары в магазинах.
АКЦИИ И ПРОМОКОДЫ
Покупайте с выгодой в магазинах и оформляйте заказ с доставкой или самовывозом.
ВСЕ МАГАЗИНЫ В ОДНОМ ПРИЛОЖЕНИИ
Актуальный ассортимент, цены и наличие товаров в Магнит, Семейном, Косметик и других магазинах сети.
ИГРЫ С ПРИЗАМИ
Играйте и получайте купоны, сувениры, скидки на доставку и предложения от партнёров, технику и другие призы.
МАГНИТ АПТЕКА
Заказывайте самовывозом лекарства, товары для здоровья и красоты. Привезём в одну из тысячи Магнит Аптек по всей России.
ЧТО ЕЩЁ ЕСТЬ В ПРИЛОЖЕНИИ
— сканер цен
— рейтинг товаров и отзывы
— журнал с рецептами и статьями
— Магнитики для выгодных покупок товаров из коллекций
— электронные чеки и история покупок
— подписка на повышенные бонусы
— чат с поддержкой
Если с заказом что-то не так, оставьте в отзыве номер. Так мы быстрее поможем.
Свяжитесь с нами, если возникнут вопросы:
— в чате в приложении
— в Telegram: @magnit_official_bot
— по телефону +7 (800) 200-90-02, бесплатно и круглосуточно

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,9,943905271,Wolt Delivery: Food and more,Wolt Oy,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/wolt-delivery-food-and-more/id943905271?uo=4,0.0,4.78788,66,Food & Drink,"Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.

The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!
Order (almost) anything, on-demand.

Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores.
Top offers, only on Wolt.

Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!
Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.
Make every occasion special with Wolt

We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.
Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!
Track every step

With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.
Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.
Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.
Life simplified. Joy delivered.

Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.
Wolt is an Editors’ Choice!

Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.",2015-06-24T15:09:19Z,2025-11-24T06:08:35Z
md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,10,1283803260,Star Kebab,Cebanu Vadim,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/star-kebab/id1283803260?uo=4,0.0,3.42424,33,Food & Drink,"Noutăți bune de la Star Kebab

Viitorul este digital și în ultimii ani, am lucrat continuu la îmbunătățirea aplicației mobile. După varianta lansată la începutul anului trecut, care a rezolvat problemele versiunii anterioare și a simplificat procesul de comandă și programul de fidelizare, am promis funcționalități noi și ne ținem de cuvânt!
O aplicație mobilă mai puternică - Mai puțin timp cu comenzile.

Le avem acum: din aplicația Star Kebab poți să lansezi comenzi prealabile în restaurantul dorit, ca să economisești timp. Mai exact, poți alege să plasezi o comandă înainte de a veni la locațiile noastre pentru ridicarea acesteia. Sau poți comanda în aplicație când ajungi la noi, pentru a nu mai fi nevoit să aștepți la rând. Iei un loc, te bucuri de o pauză și noi îți pregătim comanda!

Pe lângă funcția de self-order, în aplicație totul este la îndemână. Poți verifica oricând câte puncte ai în Star Club, dar și istoricul acumulărilor tale. Comanzi online cu livrare acasă sau la birou și, mai nou, știi exact la ce etapă este comanda ta.
Cu noul meniu, ai mai multă libertate în alegeri! Alege produsul preferat, comandă-l în COMBO și ai cel puțin 10% reducere la valoarea acestuia!
Și tot în aplicație beneficiezi de cele mai avantajoase oferte, extra-uri speciale și cadouri de ziua ta.
Descarcă aplicația Star Kebab și încearcă chiar acum toate posibilitățile pe care ți le oferă!",2017-11-07T23:58:37Z,2024-03-19T13:37:38Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,11,1058959277,Uber Eats: Food & Groceries,"Uber Technologies, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/uber-eats-food-groceries/id1058959277?uo=4,0.0,4.74092,386,Food & Drink,"Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.
FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal.
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.
SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE

For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.
ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME

Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats.
You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*
SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!
ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.
REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.
FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS

Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.
FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE

Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.
ABOUT UBER EATS

Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.
AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY
Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed
*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.",2016-06-06T21:35:56Z,2025-11-17T16:26:42Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,12,1052681694,Перекресток доставка продуктов,"Closed Joint Stock Company""Trade House""Perekrestok",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BA-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2/id1052681694?uo=4,0.0,5,17,Food & Drink,"Скидка 500 рублей на первую покупку при заказе от 1500 рублей по промокоду X500 . Промокод не действует на товары со скидкой и товары первой цены.
«Перекрёсток» — доставка продуктов и ваша любимая программа лояльности «Х5 клуб» в одном приложении!
В «Перекрёстке»:
- Быстрая доставка еды и свежих продуктов из ближайшего магазина «Перекрёсток».
- Не носите тяжелые сумки — заказывайте товары онлайн прямо на дом.
Карта лояльности Перекрестка — теперь она всегда с вами.
- Самовывоз — вы можете собрать корзину и просто заехать в магазин и сразу забрать пакеты.
- Проверка наличия товара в магазинах — проверяйте дома наличие товара в ближайшем супермаркете.
- Сканирование товара — сканируйте заканчивающийся товар и сразу добавляйте его в корзину для заказа.
- Акции и персональные предложения — получайте персональные скидки, кэшбэк, купоны на покупки в «Перекрёстке».
- «Заказывали ранее» — сохраняйте список продуктов и заказывайте его заново в один клик.
- Уникальные привилегии от партнеров.
- Выберите Любимый продукт и получите скидку 20% на его покупку с картой Клуба.
Где бы вы ни находились — дома или в супермаркете — в нашем приложении есть все для того, чтобы совершать покупки максимально выгодно.",2015-11-13T17:18:01Z,2025-11-23T16:23:16Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,14,1622633822,Пятёрочка: доставка продуктов,"AGROTORG, OOO",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/%D0%BF%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%91%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2/id1622633822?uo=4,0.0,4.2,5,Food & Drink,"Пятёрочка — доставка продуктов и заказ готовой еды на дом от 30 минут!

Доставляем в Москве, Санкт-Петербурге, Новосибирске, Казани, Нижнем Новгороде, Челябинске, Самаре, Омске, Ростове-на-Дону, Екатеринбурге, Уфе, Красноярске, Перми, Воронеже, Волгограде — всего в более 700 городах. Постоянно расширяем зоны доставки!
А ещё, Пятерочка — это:
ПРОГРАММА ЛОЯЛЬНОСТИ
Копите и тратьте баллы «X5 Клуба». Теперь и в  «Пятерочка Доставка»!
КЕШБЭК ЗА ПОКУПКИ
Выбирайте любимые категории и получайте кешбэк до 20%! Совершайте покупки в «Пятерочке» и в «Перекрестке» и повышайте свой уровень. Выше уровень - больше кешбэк!
СКИДКИ И АКЦИИ

У нас каждый день новые скидки и акции на разные товары. Пользуйтесь приложением как можно чаще, чтобы не пропустить выгодные предложения и купить продукты по лучшим ценам. Совершайте покупки с экономией!
БЫСТРО И УДОБНО

Быстрое оформление заказа продуктов на дом и оперативная доставка продуктов! Занимайтесь своими делами, а мы доставим ваши любимые продукты на дом от 30 минут! Ищете быструю доставку еды? Пользуйтесь приложением Пятёрочка! Заказы принимаются с 9:00 до 21:00.
Ждём вас в гости в магазинах «Пятёрочка» каждый день!
Если у вас возникли вопросы или пожелания, напишите нам на почту support@5-delivery.ru или позвоните на горячую линию 8-800-555-55-05",2022-12-06T08:00:00Z,2025-11-18T19:54:02Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,15,6698865861,Dоставка Do Dвери,"SMARTPIKASSO, TOO",https://apps.apple.com/md/app/d%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0-do-d%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8/id6698865861?uo=4,0.0,3.85714,7,Food & Drink,"Более 100 блюд азиатской и европейской кухни: классические и запечённые роллы, лапша WOK, пиццы, бургеры, мясо, салаты, супы, десерты и напитки - можно заказать с помощью приложения DDD.

Это приложение было сделано специально для тебя, оно очень удобное, простое и быстро работает. Любим тебя, как свою маму!",2024-09-19T07:00:00Z,2024-09-19T21:32:43Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,17,6752336681,Flavor Road,David Sowah,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/flavor-road/id6752336681?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Food & Drink,"Discover authentic street foods from around the world with Flavor Road. This comprehensive app helps you explore, track, and learn about traditional street foods through an interactive map, detailed encyclopedia, and personal food passport.

Navigate through a beautiful map interface to find street food locations across different countries and cities. Each food entry includes rich details like ingredients, flavors, cultural history, vendor stories, and dining etiquette. Filter foods by category, dietary preferences, or occasion to find exactly what you're looking for.

Build your culinary passport by marking foods as tried and adding favorites to your collection. Track your food journey with detailed statistics showing your exploration progress across different countries and food categories. Unlock achievements as you discover new foods and expand your culinary horizons.

Perfect for food enthusiasts, travelers, and anyone curious about global street food culture. Whether you're planning a trip or simply want to learn about different cuisines, Flavor Road brings the world's street food scene to your fingertips.",2025-09-12T07:00:00Z,2025-09-17T16:12:26Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,19,1276939967,Trattoria della nonna,Cebanu Vadim,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/trattoria-della-nonna/id1276939967?uo=4,0.0,3.66667,18,Food & Drink,"Aplicaţia este destinată fidelizării oaspeţilor reţelei localurilor Trattoria della nonna. Totodată, poți să-ți înlocuieşti cardul fizic de fidelizare, iar aplicaţia are grijă să-ți ofere aceeaşi reducere. Tot ce trebuie să faci e să introduci codul cardului tău. E simplu, nu? Bun venit la Trattoria della nonna - unde se mănâncă bine!",2017-09-04T14:51:33Z,2020-07-06T19:58:07Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,20,566347057,Just Eat - Food Delivery,Just-Eat Holdings Limited,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/just-eat-food-delivery/id566347057?uo=4,0.0,4.91589,107,Food & Drink,"On the Just Eat app, you can order food – from pizza and sushi to burgers and kebabs – along with groceries, gifts, flowers and more, all delivered right to your door. With a wide selection of restaurants, supermarkets and local shops, you can enjoy whatever you want, wherever you are.
Top brand and local heroes

Order from big brands like McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Domino’s, Wagamama, Starbucks, Greggs, Costa Coffee and even more local favourites. Explore menus with a variety of choices, including vegan and vegetarian options, to suit every craving.
Need groceries? Get them delivered.

Shop for essentials from top supermarkets like Sainsbury’s, Co-op, and Asda, or other local convenience stores. Whether you need fresh fruit, vegetables, snacks, flowers, alcohol, beauty products or household essentials, Just Eat has it all.
What can you do on the Just Eat app?
- Order food for delivery from restaurants, cafes, bakeries and more.
- Get groceries delivered to your door, including fresh produce, frozen food, drinks and everyday essentials.
- Order any time, whether it’s for breakfast, lunch, dinner or a late-night snack.
- Find lighter meal options, including poke bowls, salads, wraps, and sandwiches.
- Choose from many international cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Thai, Greek, Mexican, and Korean.
- Discover exclusive restaurant deals and discounts in the ‘Offers’ section.
Track or collect your order

Track your order in real-time with the Food Tracker® feature. You’ll receive push notifications about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries. Prefer collection? Simply choose the ‘collection’ option in the Just Eat app and pick up your order at your convenience.
Why Just Eat?
- Quick and hassle-free food delivery.
- Great offers and discounts.
- Choose to collect your order at the restaurant or store.
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, top-rated restaurants, nearby spots, and vegetarian/vegan/halal options.
- Get regular updates on your order with a handy Food Tracker®.
- Choose from multiple payment options.
With over 98,000+ restaurants, supermarkets and stores at your fingertips, Just Eat makes food and grocery delivery easier than ever.
Download the Just Eat app now and get what you love, delivered.",2020-05-18T07:00:00Z,2025-11-10T13:58:39Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,21,1401500803,Samokat: заказ еды и продуктов,RSA OOO,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/samokat-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%B7-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D1%8B-%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2/id1401500803?uo=4,0.0,4.86111,144,Food & Drink,"Самокат — это онлайн-магазин с доставкой от 15 минут. Заказывайте у нас продукты и товары для комфортного быта.
ПРИВОЗИМ БЫСТРО
— Бесплатная доставка от 15 минут.
— В каждом районе свой даркстор: внутри — холодильники и полки с продуктами, вместо покупателей — сборщики.
— Заказ собирают за 2–3 минуты и передают курьерам-партнёрам.
ВЫБИРАЕМ СВЕЖЕЕ
— Два раза в день проверяем срок годности товаров и внешний вид фруктов и овощей.
— В холодильниках поддерживаем температуру 2–4 °С, в морозильных камерах −18 °С.
ПРЕДЛАГАЕМ ТОВАРЫ БРЕНДА САМОКАТ
— Ищем производителей и выбираем тех, кто по-настоящему любит и знает своё дело.
— Все продукты проверяем на безопасность в лабораториях и пробуем сами.
ДОСТАВЛЯЕМ РАЗНЫЕ ПРОДУКТЫ
У нас есть:
— готовая еда;
— молочные продукты;
— хлеб и выпечка;
— овощи и фрукты;
— сладкое и мороженое;
— бакалея и снеки;
— мясо и рыба;
— вода и напитки;
— замороженные блюда и полуфабрикаты;
— веганские и вегетарианские продукты и напитки.
ДОСТАВЛЯЕМ ТЫСЯЧИ ТОВАРОВ ПО КЛИКУ

У нас более 4000 новых товаров с доставкой по клику. Такие товары легко узнать по значку «По клику с 19:00». Если вы сделаете заказ до указанного времени — мы привезём его в даркстор в тот же день. Если позже, то на следующий. Когда вам будет удобно принять заказ, нажмите кнопку «Привезти сейчас» — и мы будем у вас через 30 минут.
ПРОВОДИМ АКЦИИ
— Каждый день обновляем скидки на товары.
— Даём промокоды и делаем розыгрыши.
ДЕЛИМСЯ ИНТЕРЕСНЫМ
Мы хотим вдохновлять, развлекать и быть полезными, поэтому выпускаем много контента:
— простые рецепты;
— мнения экспертов;
— обзоры товаров;
— гиды по ингредиентам.
РАБОТАЕМ ВО МНОГИХ ГОРОДАХ
— Аксай, Альметьевск, Анапа, Артём, Астрахань;
— Балаково, Балашиха, Барнаул, Батайск, Белгород, Бердск, Брянск, Бугры;
— Великий Новгород, Верхняя Пышма, Видное, Владимир, Волгоград, Волжский, Вологда, Воронеж, Всеволожск;
— Гатчина, Геленджик, Горелово;
— Дзержинск, Дзержинский, Долгопрудный, Домодедово, Дрожжино;
— Екатеринбург;
— Жуковский;
— Зеленоград, Зеленодольск;
— Иваново, Ивантеевка, Ижевск, Йошкар-Ола;
— Казань, Калуга, Кемерово, Киров, Коломна, Колпино, Кольцово, Королев, Кострома, Котельники, Красногорск, Краснодар, Красноярск, Кронштадт, Кстово, Кудрово, Курган, Курск;
— Липецк, Лобня, Ломоносов, Лопатино, Лыткарино, Люберцы;

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,22,6479693198,Eatr・AI Healthy Diet Meal Plan,EATR LLC,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/eatr-ai-healthy-diet-meal-plan/id6479693198?uo=4,0.0,4.82653,98,Food & Drink,"Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs!

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,23,6473545088,SUSHKA | Кишинёв,Alina Panteleeva,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/sushka-%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%91%D0%B2/id6473545088?uo=4,0.0,4.80701,57,Food & Drink,"Оцените всё удобство функционала:

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,24,6749859973,Egg Row Keeper,Mortu Dumitru,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/egg-row-keeper/id6749859973?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Food & Drink,"EggRow Keeper is a charming fridge inventory app with a unique twist — everything is designed around the metaphor of eggs in a refrigerator. The interface looks like a cozy fridge, and each product is visualized as an item in a nest, with eggs taking center stage. It helps users track food items, monitor expiration dates, estimate the total value of their fridge, and manage a shopping list — all wrapped in a light-hearted, visually engaging experience.

The main screen displays your virtual fridge with organized shelves. You can add products manually, specifying name, category, quantity, purchase date, and expiration. Categories include dairy, vegetables, meat, eggs, and others — each placed on its own ""shelf."" Eggs are treated as a special product type, displayed in a dedicated egg tray. When an item expires, it’s marked with a distinct “rotten egg” icon for quick recognition. You can also view a filtered list of soon-to-expire or missing items.

EggRow Keeper includes a simple analysis tool. When adding items, you can enter their price (per unit, kilogram, liter, etc.). The app then calculates the total ""value"" of your fridge contents. A category breakdown shows where most of your spending goes (e.g., ""Dairy — 38%""). It also keeps track of patterns — how often you buy eggs, which items run out the fastest, and more.

The integrated shopping list helps with restocking. Items that are out of stock are suggested for the list automatically, but you can add or remove anything manually. Once an item is marked “purchased,” it can be moved directly into your fridge. You can also sort the list by category, making trips to the store more efficient.

A unique feature of the app is the “Egg of the Day” — a daily card offering a fun fact, quote, or practical food storage tip. The cards come in various humorous moods like “The Philosopher Egg” or “The Proud Egg.” You can save these cards to your gallery or share them with friends on social media.

Additional settings include expiration reminders, currency and unit preferences, data reset, and access to the privacy policy and developer info. EggRow Keeper offers a practical yet playful approach to home food organization — especially for egg lovers.",2025-08-12T07:00:00Z,2025-08-27T19:30:13Z

md,"Moldova, Republic of",Food & Drink,6023,25,1637664984,La Vida.Еда,Maxim Radchenko,https://apps.apple.com/md/app/la-vida-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0/id1637664984?uo=4,0.0,3,17,Food & Drink,"La Vida.Еда - первое приложение доставки еды в котором собраны все Ваши любимые рестораны.

Доставка осуществляется по г. Тирасполь, Бендеры, Рыбница и ближайшим населённым пунктам.",2023-04-22T07:00:00Z,2025-09-03T21:22:19Z
